programme.title: ANDAI KU TAHU - EP 1

programme.title: Aku Senang Kalo Kamu Bek Bek Aja?
programme.desc: Mela's marriage to Jordy failed due to her father's disapproval. Dion, a wealthy mama's boy, came to the village and met Mela herding ducks. It turned out that Dion and Mela's mother were friends from college and intended to arrange a marriage for their children.

programme.title: LIGA DANGDUT 2021 - EP 24
programme.desc: 70 Ambassadors from 34 Provinces compete for the Champion of the Largest Dangdut Competition in Indonesia. Best display, spectacular stage.

programme.title: Cewek Jetset Kadang Bikin Wah Kadang Hah
programme.desc: One day, Alexa (Nabila Zavira) meets Darman (Erdin Werdrayana). Feeling comfortable, Alexa complains about her father's lack of attention. Darman also complains about his family's financial situation, which is in dire need of money. Alexa suddenly has an idea: Darman kidnaps Alexa and demands a ransom from her father.

programme.title: BALI TRADISI - EP 47

programme.title: Cewek Cromboloni Menyala Adindakuh
programme.desc: One day, while Dania (Nabila Zavira) was riding her motorcycle, she saw her boyfriend, Rangga (Joshua Otay), with another woman. Dania was shocked, not expecting her boyfriend to be cheating on her with another woman behind her back. Afterward, Dania reflected alone in a park. She said she wished someone had given her a hug when she was so vulnerable.

programme.title: BARAYA URANG PASUNDAN - EP 31

programme.desc: A semi-documentary exploring many aspects, such as cultures, culinary, and many more of cities in Indonesia

programme.desc: Gaspol, an SCTV game show hosted by Raffi Ahmad, is filled with prizes and tens of millions of rupiah in cash.

programme.title: Horang Kaya Dengan Kearifan Cinta Lokalnya
programme.desc: Maya's (Jennifer Eve) family suddenly receives a windfall, becoming wealthy and wealthy. Maya's father, wanting a comfortable new home for his family, decides to buy a luxury home. Meanwhile, Aryan (Fauzan Nasrul), a young man, has just returned to Indonesia from abroad. Upon arriving home, he is shocked to discover that his house has become Maya's family's. A dispute ensues between Aryan and Maya's family.

programme.title: Biar Ndeso Tapi Bisa Bikin Romantis
programme.desc: Dara (Andi Viola) comes from a village and is known as a country bumpkin. Dara's arrival in Jakarta was originally to find her birth mother, but instead, she met Eza (Hardi Fadhillah). Meanwhile, Eza was ordered by his grandfather to marry Dara, even though he has a very beautiful and fashionable girlfriend.

programme.desc: A beautiful girl (Nabila Zavira) has a phobia of geckos. That day, a gecko fell on her, but she doesn't believe in superstition and will still go to Jakarta, even though her mother forbids it. However, upon arriving in Jakarta, the girl meets a boss (Rizky Alatas) who has a pet reptile named Gecko. From there, the girl works around while looking after Gecko. Unfortunately, when the girl looks for Gecko in the cashier's drawer, she is suspected of stealing.

programme.title: Asap Neng Sate Bau-bau Cinta
programme.desc: Bintang is willing to replace Doni to be matched for the sake of money, but Bintang (Eza Gionino) is surprised, because the girl who is matched with Doni, his boss, is Alya (Jenniver Eve), the satay seller, who has always been at odds with him. Strangely, slowly but surely, Bintang actually likes Alya because of her kindness, cheerfulness, and beauty. However, Alya still does not know that Bintang is pretending to be the one who is matched with her.

programme.title: LITERALLY INI ME VS MOMMY
programme.desc: On her birthday, Ratu (Maudy Effrosina) and her mother, Amelia (Kaemita Boediono), both have a wish. Ratu wants a boyfriend who's older than her, so he can take care of her and her mother. Amelia also wants another partner who's right for her.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 53
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Cinta Dodol Inilah Yang Membuatku Lengket Kepadamu
programme.desc: A girl named Marini was forced to marry a loan shark. Marini was determined to work in Garut to pay off her father's debt to the loan shark. Then, there was Mas Raka, the grandson of the owner of the place where Marini worked. He was a grumpy person, while Mas Wisesa was sweeter than Mas Raka. While working, it turned out that Raka and Wisesa liked Marini. Raka was even jealous of Marini because she was closer to Wisesa.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 507
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 33
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: LIONTIN AJAIB WHICH IS PEMBAWA JODOH
programme.desc: At a hospital or clinic, Rangga and Intan met, and fell in love at first sight. At the clinic, Rangga only had one pimple checked (he felt overwhelmed because there was a pimple growing on his face) while Intan took her sick father. Well, because Intan's driver was stuck in traffic, finally Rangga was kind enough to take Intan and her father, even when they arrived at the luxurious house, Rangga also helped his father get into a wheelchair and took him inside.

programme.title: Pesona Kulimu Mengalihkan Duniaku
programme.desc: While the resort is being renovated, Prilly (Ina Marika) meets a handsome porter named Bara (Ridho Illahi). Prilly is captivated by his handsomeness. However, many people mock her for her lack of taste.

programme.title: KUTUNGGU JOMBLONYA SI RATU AYAM
programme.desc: Fira (Yasmin Napper) is extremely stressed because her family is bankrupt and she has to work on her grandfather's chicken farm. At the chicken farm, Fira meets Erwin (Ridho Ilahi), who is assigned to find chickens for his restaurant. Erwin actually has a phobia of chickens, but to gain Grandma's trust, Erwin is forced to do it. Fira and Erwin also often fight.

programme.desc: Eve (Jennifer Eve) has to deal with an annoying boss. He refuses to accept anything from her if she's late. If Eve is even a minute late, he will scold her. One day, in a fit of rage, Eve insults him for always being single. However, one night, Eve finds him on the roof and mistakenly believes he's trying to kill himself.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 508
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: LIONTIN AJAIB WHICH IS PEMBAWA JODOH
programme.desc: At a hospital or clinic, Rangga and Intan met, and fell in love at first sight. At the clinic, Rangga only had one pimple checked (he felt overwhelmed because there was a pimple growing on his face) while Intan took her sick father. Well, because Intan's driver was stuck in traffic, finally Rangga was kind enough to take Intan and her father, even when they arrived at the luxurious house, Rangga also helped his father get into a wheelchair and took him inside.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 35
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: Pelan Pelan Kejar Cintanya Mas Gemoy
programme.desc: Laras and Jane had to face the reality that their luxury home had been confiscated, and their father had been conned and suddenly bankrupt. Finally, Laras and Jane went to their aunt's hometown in Garut. There, they met Bara, the son of her aunt's friend.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 55
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Cinta Miss Kambing Makin Kesini, Makin Kesana
programme.desc: Nayla invites Akbar to work on her farm for a month in hopes of securing a contract to supply goat meat for her new restaurant. However, behind what initially seems like a simple task, a captivating love story develops amidst the hustle and bustle of farm life.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 509
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. programme.title: Dahlia - EP 30

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series - EP 25

programme.title: Tapao - EP 1
programme.desc: Kembara mencari makan menyajikan keindahan visual. Tapi bagaimana jika hidangan itu dibungkus? Adakah sama enak di meja restoran? Kena dengan namanya, Tapao mencari jawapan di sebalik persoalan ini.

programme.title: Tak Kot - EP 13
programme.desc: Saksikan selebriti popular tanah air bercuti sambil dicabar menangani fobia yang terdapat dalam diri mereka. Berjayakah mereka menyelesaikan misi?

programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang wanita bernama Mona. Dia adalah wanita yang suka motosikal, dan juga suka bertengkar, jadi dia digelar wanita yang kuat.

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 65
programme.desc: Zain terkejut bila mendapat tahu Dr Farhan telah membayar rawatan perubatan Adrian. Noor tidak sangka yang Eyra tergamak mahu meracuni Adrian. Eyra tampil memberi satu kejutan baru kepada Adellia.

programme.title: Naluri Hati - EP 22
programme.desc: Pada hari perkahwinannya, Dinda teragak-agak kerana dia akan berkahwin dengan orang yang tidak dicintainya. Namun, satu kejadian berlaku dan menyebabkan Dinda mengalami amnesia separa.

programme.title: RASA Projek Gerenti Jadi - EP 6
programme.desc: Majalah masakan di Malaysia kini di kaca televisyen anda memaparkan resepi - resepi menarik setiap minggu yang dihoskan oleh Norzaini Abdul Halim (Aunty Aini) bersama - sama Adam Mahamed Ismail.

programme.title: The House: Ezurin Khyra - EP 5
programme.desc: The House menampilkan Ezurin Khyra yang sering menjadi sorotan kerana imej glamornya. Program ini juga menayangkan keperibadian ibu kepada lima orang cahaya mata ini yang tidak diketahui umum.

programme.title: Pengantin Lelaki Untuk Cik Gadis - EP 24
programme.desc: Kecewa dengan impian untuk bergelar tentera, Kris al-Hadi ke ladang Tok Abah. Pertemuan dengan Salsabila, gadis malang yang difitnah hingga terpenjara telah menimbulkan rasa simpati dan cinta.

programme.title: Michael Ang's Halal Kitchen - EP 2
programme.desc: Michael bersama dengan tetamu jemputan akan berkongsi nasihat dan petua bagaimana pelbagai hidangan boleh dicipta semula untuk memenuhi citarasa masyarakat gastronomi yang halal.

programme.title: 3 Campur 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Sesat, rancangan yang menguji minda dan ikhtiar hidup selebriti tempatan dalam mencari destinasi yang ditetapkan.

programme.title: Nikah, Cerai, Rujuk - EP 1
programme.desc: Hanna kecil hati dengan keluarga suaminya apabila ibu mertuanya sering sahaja mencari salahnya dan Adam pula tidak cuba untuk mempertahankan dia.

programme.title: Lara Oh Lara! - EP 13
programme.desc: Lara Oh Lara membawakan kepada anda aksi lucu dan comel Lara Alana dalam kehidupan sehariannya. Dipenuhi gelak tawa dan kecomelan anak kepada pasangan Awal Asha'ari dan Scha Al-Yahya khas untuk anda

programme.title: Dee The Series - EP 3
programme.desc: Dee bersama adik dan ibunya Amy, memulakan hidup baru di KL apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia baru untuk Dee yang penuh dengan muzik, gelak ketawa dan air mata.

programme.title: Yuna Bintang Di Langit - EP 4
programme.desc: Ikuti Yuna meneruskan kerjayanya dalam bidang muzik di sekeliling Malaysia, Los Angeles & San Diego dengan kandungan eksklusif

programme.title: i-Tanggang - EP 9
programme.desc: Erma terbaring atas lantai, penuh dengan darah. Esra meyakinkan Khalil dan Syafiq untuk mereka cerita dan berjanji untuk tutup mulut. Tetapi tanpa mereka sedar jiran sebelah rumah ada CCTV!

programme.title: i-Tanggang - EP 10
programme.desc: Harris rasa tak sedap hati lalu meneruskan siasatan. Esra & Syafiq ditahan & disoal siasat secara berasingan. Mereka akhirnya membuka mulut, tetapi menceritakan perkara yang berbeza.

programme.title: i-Tanggang - EP 11
programme.desc: Peguam Khalil and Syafiq setuju untuk membantu mereka tetapi mereka perlu mengaku bersalah. Khalil & Syafiq rasa dikhianati apabila Esra menceritakan kepada polis cerita yang berlainan.

programme.title: i-Tanggang - EP 12
programme.desc: Erma menyatakan Esra menikamnya sekali di belakang manakala Khalil 7 kali di dadanya. Harris dan Dr Nini berjumpa dengan Rahmat dan Azlan untuk memberitahu mereka perkara sebenar mengenai Erma.

programme.title: Carta 10 - EP 11
programme.desc: Hidup Ria yang mewah berubah sekelip mata. Demi mendapatkan harta, Ria bersubahat dengan seorang lelaki Cina iaitu Sean. Berjayakah Sean menolong Ria?

programme.title: Mat Dan Kaki Jalan - EP 12
programme.desc: Sebuah kisah travelog santai tentang perjalanan dan percutian seorang lelaki Inggeris Daniel Tayler atau dikenali sebagai Mat Dan berasal dari Cheltenham England ke Malaysia.

programme.title: Mini Me Bakes - EP 5
programme.desc: Rancangan memasak yang menampilkan selebriti Malaysia bersama anak-anak mereka di dapur, dengan citarasa Malaysia diselitkan resipi untuk diikuti oleh semua penonton.

programme.title: Fam ILY - EP 7
programme.desc: Ini kisah keluarga Shahir yang merupakan seorang kontraktor kelas F bersama isterinya Marissa (suri rumah sepenuh masa), anak remajanya Qalisha dan anak kecilnya Iman.

programme.title: Man Laksa
programme.desc: Man Laksa, pemuda yang pemalu menjalani hidup sederhana dengan menjual laksa di kampungnya. Dia menaruh hati pada gadis bernama Chah, namun tidak berbuat apa-apa kerana Chah adalah anak ketua kampung.

programme.title: Michael Ang's Halal Kitchen - EP 1
programme.desc: Michael bersama dengan tetamu jemputan akan berkongsi nasihat dan petua bagaimana pelbagai hidangan boleh dicipta semula untuk memenuhi citarasa masyarakat gastronomi yang halal.

programme.title: Roda Panas S2 - EP 2

programme.desc: Program perjalanan realiti mengenai eksplorasi solo ke beberapa negara, untuk mengalami keunikan pemandangan dan aktiviti tempat di tempat yang dilawati.

programme.title: 1 Hari Bersama Idola - EP 12
programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat peminat-peminat yang bertuah menerima kejutan dari selebriti kegemaran mereka.

programme.title: PHD Muzik - EP 9
programme.desc: Sebuah game show yang menggabungkan artis dan pasangan mereka bertarung dalam pelbagai jenis permainan untuk memenangi gelaran "PHD Muzik".

programme.title: Kultus - EP 7
programme.desc: Syakilla seorang pelajar Singapura di New York diperangkap untuk menyertai kumpulan kultus ELIXR. Syafik terbang ke New York untuk menyelamatkan adiknya. Adakah mereka berjaya menyelamatkan diri?

programme.title: Next To Neelofa S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Musim kedua ini akan menyaksikan Neelofa secara dekat dan peribadi dengan selebriti-selebriti popular tanah air untuk bercakap tentang subjek yang paling dekat di hati mereka iaitu keluarga.

programme.title: Maskulin: Who's Your Bro - EP 2
programme.desc: Rancangan realiti kecergasan penuh adrenalin yang mendefinisikan persaudaraan lelaki! 12 peserta dari pelbagai latar belakang akan berdepan cabaran fizikal dan emosi serta pemikiran strategik.

programme.title: Ex Aku Pontianak - EP 2
programme.desc: Kantoi jumpa wanita lain, Malik ditinggalkan Bella yang rupanya adalah pontianak. Malik mula diganggu lalu minta bantuan Suraya, pemburu pontianak untuk tangkap Bella dan juga zombie suruhannya!

programme.title: Extreme Roadtrip - EP 2
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan travelog yang akan mengikuti pengembaraan 3 sekawan menerokai tempat-tempat menarik di semenanjung Malaysia demi merealisasikan bucketlist masing-masing.

programme.title: Celup - EP 3
programme.desc: Kad kredit Ria tak dapat digunakan ketika mahu membayar barang dibeli dan wang tunai di dalam bank juga tinggal sedikit. Lebih mengejutkan, teman lelakinya juga mahu putuskan hubungan.

programme.title: Fam ILY - EP 7
programme.desc: Ini kisah keluarga Shahir yang merupakan seorang kontraktor kelas F bersama isterinya Marissa (suri rumah sepenuh masa), anak remajanya Qalisha dan anak kecilnya Iman.

programme.title: Malaysian Ghost Stories - EP 7
programme.desc: Nusantara merupakan satu daerah yang tebal dengan semangat mistik dan alam ghaib. Setiap episod mempunyai penyelesaian yang unik bergantung kepada jenis gangguan, jenis jin dan kesan ke atas watak utama.

programme.title: Solo YOLO - EP 1
programme.desc: Program perjalanan realiti mengenai eksplorasi solo ke beberapa negara, untuk mengalami keunikan pemandangan dan aktiviti tempat di tempat yang dilawati.

programme.title: Roda Panas S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Trend terkini kereta atau motosikal mengenai enjin, roda dan aktiviti yang berkaitan dengan dunia automotif.

programme.title: 1 Hari Bersama Idola - EP 12
programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat peminat-peminat yang bertuah menerima kejutan dari selebriti kegemaran mereka.

programme.title: Mini Me Bakes - EP 5

programme.title: Man Laksa
programme.desc: Man Laksa, pemuda yang pemalu menjalani hidup sederhana dengan menjual laksa di kampungnya. Dia menaruh hati pada gadis bernama Chah, namun tidak berbuat apa-apa kerana Chah adalah anak ketua kampung.

programme.title: Nikah, Cerai, Rujuk - EP 2
programme.desc: Hanna kecil hati dengan keluarga suaminya apabila ibu mertuanya sering sahaja mencari salahnya dan Adam pula tidak cuba untuk mempertahankan dia.

programme.title: Baikpunya - EP 1
programme.desc: Program ini akan membawa anda dalam perjalanan untuk mengetahui tempat-tempat tersembunyi dan tempat-tempat popular di Malaysia yang disyorkan oleh penduduk tempatan.

programme.title: Dee The Series - EP 4
programme.desc: Dee bersama adik dan ibunya Amy, memulakan hidup baru di KL apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia baru untuk Dee yang penuh dengan muzik, gelak ketawa dan air mata.

programme.title: Travel With Mommy: Misi Anak Mak - EP 6

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 61
programme.desc: Dengan kehadiran 'Bedah', Eyra dapat meneruskan langkahnya untuk mejatuhkan Adellia. Nabil terpaksa meminta pertolongan Adellia untuk menyelamatkan perniagaan Zayn. Maria masih penuh dengan muslihat.

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 62
programme.desc: Kerana kepenatan bekerja, Zayn hampir pengsan. Maria risau kerana Mak Pah sudah mula menyiasat tentang identitinya yang sebenar. Maria cuba memecat Adellia daripada bekerja di Synergy.

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 63
programme.desc: Mak Pah risau apabila Maria tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Arif ada cadangan untuk menyingkirkan Maria. Keadaan kesihatan Adrian semakin teruk. Nabil mahu fikirkan masa depannya di syarikat Zayn.

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 64
programme.desc: Helah Bedah dapat dikesan oleh Dr Farhan. Namun Bedah keliru kerana Dr Farhan juga ada agenda tersendiri. Maria terkejut apabila Mak Pah tiba-tiba muncul dan menyerangnya. Eyra mula mendekati Maria.

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 65
programme.desc: Zain terkejut bila mendapat tahu Dr Farhan telah membayar rawatan perubatan Adrian. Noor tidak sangka yang Eyra tergamak mahu meracuni Adrian. Eyra tampil memberi satu kejutan baru kepada Adellia.

programme.desc: A simple man Vijay is recruited by a police officer to masquerade as the Don, the leader of an international gang of smugglers. However, something goes wrong. Release Year: 2006 Director: Farhan Akhtar

programme.title: Dabangg
programme.desc: A corrupt police officer faces challenges from his family, gangsters and politicians. programme.title: Maine Pyar Kiya
programme.desc: Prem loves Suman. But to marry her, Prem has to prove to her father that he is not the same as his dad, who had insulted both Suman and her father. Release Year: 1989 Director: Sooraj R. Barjatya Awards: Filmfare Awards:Best Film: Tarachand Barjatya Best Music DirectorBest Lyricist: Asad Bhopali Best Playback Singer: Balasubramaniam S.P.

programme.title: Phool Aur Kante
programme.desc: Nageshwar hands over his empire to his son Ajay, but Nageshwar's unhappy associates kidnap his grandson Gopal. Release Year: 1991 Director: Kuku Kohli

programme.title: Fukrey 3
programme.desc: The Fukras plan to take over Delhi and run for city elections. However, they have no money, so they take on an international job to make a quick buck, which changes their lives forever. Release Year: 2023 Director: Mrighdeep Singh Lamba Awards: 2023 Winner Surfers' Choice Award- Best Actor in a Comic Role- Varun Sharma

programme.title: Dabangg 2
programme.desc: Chulbul Pandey, a wayward policeman, kills the brother of a crooked politician. In retribution, the politician sends his henchmen to attack Chulbul's wife which leaves Chulbul infuriated. Release Year: 2012 Director: Arbaaz Khan Awards: 2013 Winner Popular Award for Best Actor - Salman Khan

programme.title: Hum Saath Saath Hain
programme.desc: A joint family faces inner turmoil when a mother's disdain for her stepson causes the other family members to pick sides. Will the mother realise her mistake or will this permanently break the family? Release Year: 1999 Director: Sooraj R. Barjatya Awards: 1 win and 9 nominations

programme.title: Big Dhamaka
programme.desc: Trouble ensues when two lookalikes from varying backgrounds fall for the same girl. However, an unsuspecting connection between the duplicates further complicates their situation.

programme.title: Dil Chahta Hai
programme.desc: In this engaging film, three close friends navigate the challenges that arise when one of them unexpectedly falls for an older divorcee, testing their bond and sparking unexpected moments. Release Year: 2001 Director: Farhan Akhtar

programme.desc: Nisha's elder sister Pooja marries Rajesh. Soon Rajesh's younger brother Prem and Nisha fall in love. Release Year: 1994 Director: Sooraj R. Barjatya

programme.desc: Nageshwar hands over his empire to his son Ajay, but Nageshwar's unhappy associates kidnap his grandson Gopal. Release Year: 1991 Director: Kuku Kohli

programme.desc: Watch behind the scenes and meet the cast and crew of the movie.

programme.title: Pyar Mein Twist
programme.desc: With their respective children's' marriages about to take place, two middle-aged single parents fall in love.

programme.desc: Shankar, a contract killer, manages to escape after murdering a politician. Later, he helps the police find a murderer when an officer's memory is transferred to him.

programme.title: Patthar Ke Phool
programme.desc: A young police officer and the daughter of a gangster fall in love at first sight.

programme.title: Nishchaiy
programme.desc: When Ravi is falsely accused of a crime and sentenced to imprisonment, his boss' wife promises to take care of his younger brother. However, Ravi is unable to find his brother after he is released.

programme.title: Saaiyara
programme.desc: Passionate lovers navigate a rollercoaster romance, facing euphoric highs and crushing lows while desperately clinging to their tumultuous bond.

programme.title: Le Miracle Suisse
programme.desc: The Swiss are wise and reasonable. But, they sometimes have a crazy side. They speak four languages, vote all the time, love trains, cows, military paraphernalia, garden gnomes, cleanliness, play music to their cheeses and do unlikely sports...

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Breaking down stereotypes, cliches and preconceived ideas, whatever the culture, nationality, sexual orientation, social background... Recounted by Magloire, through his story and the interwoven portraits of others, the series "Rassemblance" shows that integration is possible, that difference is an advantage for the common good, helping us to live together better.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match - EP 67
programme.desc: Winner of the Giro d'Italia, the Tour de France, and the World Championship in 1987, he is one of only three riders along with Eddy Merckx and Tadej Pogacar to have achieved this triple. Former cyclist Stephen Roche reflects on his career.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jerome Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Les Maitres Du Champagne
programme.desc: Associated with elegance and luxury, champagne is one of the most prestigious wines of French heritage, characterized by unique know-how and subject to a controlled designation of origin. But how did a simple wine grown in a rather mediocre wine-growing region become this exceptional beverage?

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 30
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 12
programme.desc: The Maison des Canuts traces the long tradition of Lyon's gold, silver and silk weavers. Each creation by visual artist Sarah Valente sounds like a call from the forest. Zomer is turning fashion upside down. In Brittany, craftsman Thibaut Thierry works paper with seaweed.

programme.title: Marc-Antoine Le Bret - Solo

programme.title: Les Petits Meurtres D'agatha Christie
programme.desc: The presenter of the programme ''Aux Frontieres du Cosmos'' is found murdered, in mysterious circumstances. programme.title: 13h15 Le Dimanche
programme.desc: An alternative take on the news, current events and politics, both dynamic and different in its approach.

programme.title: Un Chateau En Cadeau
programme.desc: Andre Manoukian invites his friend Bruno Solo for an extraordinary Christmas in the Chateau de Chenonceau. The pair share the magic of the festive season with a host of other guests on this uniquely enchanting journey.

programme.title: Nous, Les Europeens - EP 3
programme.desc: Just fifteen years ago, Portugal was on the brink of bankruptcy. Today, the country is back on the path to growth, although challenges remain. Our report takes us to Lisbon. The Portuguese capital has become attractive to foreigners. Recently, it's been Americans, sometimes disappointed by Donald Trump's election, who are moving there. What are the reasons behind this enthusiasm? What are the consequences for the local population?

programme.title: Hot Dogs - EP 1
programme.desc: In Salvan, Frani meets Marion, 31, and her dog Maya.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Les Nouveaux Boss - EP 4
programme.desc: The very first pan-African audiovisual competition for entrepreneurs. For eight weeks, sixteen candidates from all over Africa will be accompanied by four exceptional mentors as they develop their project: Claude Borna, A'Salfo, Nicole Sulu and Yassine Laghzioui. A number of celebrities will also come to talk about their experiences, including champion Teddy Riner.

programme.title: Championnats De Patisserie : 9 Mois Avec L'equipe Belge - EP 1
programme.desc: Jean-Philippe Darcis, Raphael Giot and Patrick Aubrion, three artisans of taste and former medallists, have recruited the Pastry Lions. Their objective: the World Cup after the entry ticket to the European Cup. A huge challenge in the face of formidable competition. Take a look at the training sessions and the different stages of the qualification process!

programme.title: Championnats De Patisserie : 9 Mois Avec L'equipe Belge - EP 2
programme.desc: A few months have passed since the European selection in Paris. One training session follows another: a thousand movements rehearsed and perfected. And the moment of truth approaches when the Pastry Lions begin their marathon of precision and endurance against the best in Lyon. Will they be up to the challenge at these sweet Olympics?

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Diane De Poitiers - EP 1
programme.desc: Despite her influence over Henri II, younger son of Francois I, the position of Diane de Poitiers at court remained delicate in the presence of the powerful Anne de Pisseleu, the king's favourite. Will Henri's wedding to Catherine de' Medici put an end to her plans once and for all?

programme.title: Top 14 Rugby Le Mag - EP 13
programme.desc: Presenting the day's action in the Top 14, the French rugby championship, with summaries and highlights from the matches, players interviews and comments.

programme.title: Comme Un Avion
programme.desc: Michel is a computer graphics designer and an avid fan of airmail. One day, he discovers a new passion for kayaking. He decides to buy a kit boat and, encouraged by his wife, Rachelle, heads off on a solo trip. He is soon meeting more and more people along the river.

programme.title: FANTASY SHOW - FRI 26 DEC
programme.desc: Haaland or Salah? Saka or Palmer? Isak or Cunha? Picking your Fantasy team is never easy, but the Fantasy Show is on hand to help FPL Managers with those big decisions.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 18
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.desc: Few players have left a mark on the Premier League quite like five-time champion, Michael Carrick. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 30
programme.desc: Three decades on from Manchester United's iconic Class of '92, PL Stories steps beyond the headline names to rediscover the teammates who shared the same dressing room, dreams, and demands of one of football's most revered youth systems. We sit down with the lesser-known graduates who lived that journey first-hand, players whose paths diverged from the global spotlight but whose experiences offer a rare and revealing window into the reality behind the legend.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 28
programme.desc: We join Regis Le Bris as he charts his meteoric journey from the training pitches of France to the dugout at Sunderland, where he masterminded an unlikely charge to the Premier League. Le Bris reflects on the philosophy and resilience that helped his side punch far above their weight. We also travel back to France to uncover the formative experiences and influences that shaped one of football's most intriguing modern managers.

programme.title: FS MMA Mick Thompson vs. Mike Weir
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Nick Thompson and Mike Weir look to take each other out in Vancouver, Canada. One man is victorious after only four minutes of the first round.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Timothy Bradley vs. Luis Carlos Abregu
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a bout between 2 undefeated fighters, Timothy 'Desert Storm' Bradley (25-0, 11 KOs) vs. Luis Carlos Abregu, aka 'El Potro' (29-0, 23 KOs) from the Agua Caliente Casino, Rancho Mirage in California, USA on July 17, 2010.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Mike Tyson vs. Sammy Scaff
programme.desc: The talk of the boxing world takes center stage as a young Mike Tyson displays the lethal combination of speed and power that would later make him a World Champion. Tyson enters the Felt Forum in New York City with a 13-0 record, having knocked out every opponent he's faced thus far, with 9 of those knockouts coming in the first round.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paulie Malignaggi vs. Lovemore N'Dou
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Paulie Malignaggi challenging Lovemore N'Dou for the IBF world super lightweight title. Malignaggi looks for a dominating performance to launch him into bouts with boxing superstars such as Ricky Hatton, Juan Diaz and Zab Judah.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Kakuryu, Ikioi, Endo and Yutakayama from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Luis Maysonet
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (48-3 22 KO 150 lbs) looks to continue his winning streak against Luis Maysonet (28-5 28 KO) in a 10-round contest from Foxwoods Resort Mashantucket CT USA.

programme.desc: This episode features James Kirkland as he faces Alfredo Angulo in an explosive, hard-hitting fight, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavily-anticipated welterweight bout featuring Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and "Sugar" Shane Mosley. programme.title: MEGA Fights Yuriorkis Gamboa vs. Marcos Ramirez

This episode features undefeated featherweights Yuriorkis Gamboa, 'El Cinclon de Guantanamo', (11-0, 9 KOs) and Marcos Ramirez (25-0, 16 KOs) from the Pechanga Resort and Casino in Temecula, California, USA, on October 4, 2008. The two young fighters had a quick ending street brawl that brought the crowd to its feet.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: Featuring Men's CMX Forms and Weapons, and a World Record Break by Chip Townsend at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights James Kirkland vs. Alfredo Angulo
programme.desc: This episode features James Kirkland as he faces Alfredo Angulo in an explosive, hard-hitting fight, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavily-anticipated welterweight bout featuring Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and "Sugar" Shane Mosley. The fight, which generated $78 million in revenue, was Mayweather's first title fight since his comeback from his first retirement. Also on the card, heavyweight Bermane Stiverne and two-weight world champ Marcos Maidana.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Chiyonokuni, Tamawashi, Takayasu and Chiyotairyu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Heath Todd
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (61-3-1 29 KO) vs. Heath Todd (32-10-0 13 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from the War Memorial Auditorium in Ft. Lauderdale FL USA.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Nkazimulo Zulu vs. Jake Hadley
programme.desc: This episode features a flyweight championship bout as Jake Hadley takes on the veteran Nkazimulo Zulu. Bonus coverage includes Mutuale Basambombo vs. HP Van Staden and Christian Bobo vs. Adrian Sanchez.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi I
programme.desc: We look back to the beginning of the historic years-long rivalry between Marco Huck and Ola Afolabi, which began in Ludwigsburg, Germany with Huck putting his WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line for the first time. The result would be a closely fought, all-action contest that would lead to three more meetings between the two cruiserweights for years to come. Don't miss the kick off to the Huck vs. Afolabi rivalry for the WBO Cruiserweight World Title on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi II
programme.desc: In this edition of World Class Championship Boxing, the WBO Cruiserweight World Championship is on the line when Germany's Marco Huck and Britain's Ola Afolabi meet for the second time in their memorable rivalry. Huck is coming off a majority decision defeat to Alexander Povetkin three months earlier, when he stepped up in weight to compete for the Heavyweight Title.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S7) - EP 5
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'e', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We see some eggs, elbows and elves, and watch some exercising elephants!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: The friends are on safari and collect stars for every animal they spot. Mae-Mae wants to see them all but when things take a muddy turn, can they get their safari adventure back on track?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 7
programme.desc: Zam tries out her new navigator, which takes the friends to Socktropolis. But when the batteries run out, how will they get back?

programme.desc: Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mum thinks she is still too young. When Bingo joins in, the kids make up their own rules, but they still can't beat Dad.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 9
programme.desc: Bluey teaches Bingo how to use magic so she can make Mum play with her, but she forgets to explain the most important rule: never use magic for cheekiness.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 10
programme.desc: Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.desc: When it's Bingo's turn to bring her Kindy's Bob Bilby puppet home and record their weekend in the scrapbook, the family resolve to show him a good time.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 15

programme.desc: Andy and Jen are sent to North America to check on a swift fox mum who has been left to bring up four cubs on her own.

programme.desc: Sylvie visits a school to help ease first day school nerves. Sylvie helps the children find their classroom and when the time comes for play, Sylvie goes first to demonstrate how much fun it is.

programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet a noisy sea lion and see his swimming skills. They also give some capybara breakfast and find they have a surprising skill in common with the sea lion.

programme.desc: Bella and Lift visit the Cloud Kitchen, where Patch is busy with the Playtimers making a tasty treat called Munchy Muddy Meadows.

programme.desc: The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them.

programme.desc: Happy sets his sights on a questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in!

programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels hop inside the Biology Bus and miniaturize themselves.

programme.desc: Stanley and the children tour the museum and quickly realise there's nothing about them or their friends, so they make a new exhibit all about their town today!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 52
programme.desc: Fifi, Little Woo and Fred call up Stanley to ask him to film their new song. They go around the town trying to find the perfect place.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 60
programme.desc: Monty is upset when a friend doesn't return his toy, and decides that he won't lend anything again. He soon realises that this isn't always helpful.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 42
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran need to get the train home after a trip to the museum. JoJo learns bout train timetables and train tickets.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 6
programme.desc: When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 7
programme.desc: Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.desc: As Roly makes his usual noise in the Clubhouse, Duggee and the Squirrels reminisce about how completely different Roly was when he first arrived.

programme.desc: Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.desc: Kyan wants to climb Mount Everest, but his daring plan is interrupted by Grandmaster Glitch, who's careering down the mountain in a giant snowball.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S2) - EP 21
programme.desc: Pak Choi, who might be known by many names, sings about how she's "Always Pak To You!"

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S2) - EP 20
programme.desc: It's wish-granter Mango, ready to make all the Roots and Fruits cast wishes come true.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 27

programme.desc: Supertato shows the Grape Kids how to camp Supertato-style, but Evil Pea arrives and wows them with her ice camping. Before long, the Grape Kids need to be rescued by Supertato.

programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 20

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus - EP 1
programme.desc: _x000D_ _x000D_When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn’t work quite how they’d hoped.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless "Heart of Fire Ruby" a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that they'll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaad's haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: Madly Madagascar S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost of Lord Farquaad S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.desc: After one "button" unleashes the gigantic robot MEGA-MEGAmind on Metro City, MegaMind and Minion must rely on their old tricks to restore order.

programme.desc: Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 29

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 32

programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 26
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.desc: The Founding Fathers established the pillars of freedom and democracy. New information has emerged about the secrets of these important historical figures. What truths have remained in the shadows?

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: From priceless treasure found inside a lost city to an ancient manuscript hidden behind a wall, we explore secrets lost deep inside various unseen chambers, like tunnels, caves, or even burial sites.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2) - EP 9
programme.desc: We've heard the tales of great wars fought with groundbreaking weaponry, but what about everything else in between? Like missiles manned by pigeons to a helmet outfitted with firearms.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2) - EP 10

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S2) - EP 10
programme.desc: A game designer named Steve Jobs starts a personal computer company in his parents' garage on his way to bringing computers mainstream.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Secrets of the South (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Gino is in the city of Gallipoli. He joins a diver on her small boat as they head to the sea caves. She forages for red oysters which they eat with a glass of rose. Gino heads into town and tries out Scapece, a dish of fish in saffron and of religious significance in the city. Inspired by the the saffron and fresh fish, Gino demonstrates the Puglian classic Tiella, the Italian answer to paella, made with mussels, rice and potatoes.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2

programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 2
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: CNBC’s longest running feature show. For over 20 years Christine Tan has been talking to people who are shaping, governing and leading the Asia-Pacific region in this multi-award award winning show.

programme.desc: CNBC goes on assignment at the biggest events around the world, bringing you interviews and insight from the most influential leaders in business, politics, activism and the arts.

programme.title: Curry Inc.: The Business of Stephen Curry
programme.desc: Curry Inc: The Business of Stephen Curry explores how the greatest shooter of all time is preparing for life after basketball. Through exclusive interviews with Stephen Curry, his head coach Steve Kerr, and key executives behind his growing business ventures, CNBC Media & Sports Reporter Alex Sherman takes viewers inside Thirty Ink, Curry's growing business empire.

programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich.

programme.desc: Highlights from the latest PGA TOUR tournament.

programme.title: CNBC Sports - Reaction Sports - EP 12
programme.desc: The best of extreme sports action from around the world.

programme.title: CNBC Sports - Asian Le Mans Series - EP 2
programme.desc: Created by the Automobile Club de l’Ouest (ACO), the Asian Le Mans Series symbolises the Spirit of Le Mans, holding the same shared passion for creating world class endurance racing in Asia. The Asian Le Mans Series is growing year on year and is attracting some of the world’s most successful endurance racing teams, as well as fostering new and emerging talent from the region.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers

programme.title: New Energy Finance Forum
programme.desc: At Abu Dhabi Finance Week, the CNBC New Energy Finance Forum gathers top business leaders and investors to explore the multi-trillion-dollar shift reshaping the global energy landscape. Experts discuss how to meet the soaring energy demand driven by cutting-edge AI and share insights on investment opportunities in clean energy that will power the future.

programme.title: CNBC Explains - EP 4
programme.desc: ‘CNBC Explains’ is a dynamic explainer series that dives deep into the forces shaping our world. Each episode unpacks complex business and economic topics, breaking them down into clear, compelling narratives. With expert insights, data-driven visuals and a global perspective, this series helps viewers understand not just what is happening, but why it matters.

programme.title: Executive Decisions - EP 9
programme.desc: ‘Executive Decisions’ is a CNBC podcast offering a rare window into the minds of top decision-makers. Hosted by Steve Sedgwick, each episode explores the pivotal choices that shape the careers and legacies of business leaders and policymakers. Through candid conversations about risk, doubt and conviction, the series reminds us that even the most powerful face uncertainty and trade-offs.

programme.desc: In southwestern Zimbabwe, art has been a language for millennia. Scattered across the towering hills are cave paintings dating back over 13,000 years. Today, in the rural villages of the Matobos, another vibrant tradition thrives; house painting.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: With little arable land and scarce mineral resources but beautiful beaches and waters, tourism is integral to Cape Verde's economy. While country leaders are hoping this growth will turbocharge a prosperous new chapter for the country, industry leaders are looking at ways to create infrastructure, both on the ground and online, that can ensure a sustainable industry as well. Also: since the late 1970s, Animal Care Services Konsult has been in the business of livestock.

programme.title: Marketplace Europe
programme.desc: Web Summit has become the must-attend conference in Europe for the tech world. For founders, investors, policymakers and startups, it provides a front-row seat for the tech debates that will shape our future. Europe continues to lag behind when it comes to unicorns - while the U.S. has around 800 startups valued at over $1billion, Europe has just over 200 - but that number has been growing with the AI boom, so we sat down with some of those leading lights in the continent's tech scene.

programme.title: Quest's World of Wonder

programme.desc: Clean energy projects are transforming businesses and lives in Malaysia, South Africa and Australia. programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, the Agenda quite simply sets the agenda. You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling. The program provides a unique platform for the best current affairs documentaries from around the globe. Big Story aims to present the contemporary world and China’s global perspectives on the contemporary world to an international audience.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Travelogue
programme.desc: Travelogue is a 30-minute travel program. Through the journeys of our intrepid hosts, we experience the beauty, culture and mystery of China, discovering how people live in this vast country and showcasing China's transformation to the world._x000D__x000D__x000D_

programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.desc: The essence of trade lies in "joy for the buyer, happiness for the seller." Season 2 follows Sachi (Koshiba Fuka), who, after overcoming hardships and marrying the 6th heir Tomozo (Matsumoto Leo), faces new trials. As Isuzuya grows, she endures loss, defies convention to become its seventh female head, and boldly opens an Edo branch. programme.desc: Admired since ancient times for their beauty, Japanese swords are amazing works of art - this time, a blade wielded by the world's most famous swordsman Miyamoto Musashi: Musashi Masamune.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Colon Erika is the artistic director of a choir for children with hearing and visual impairments - the group's aim is to make music accessible to all. She talks about developing a new form of music.

programme.title: Impacts: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan presents a variety of short programmes focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: Ukiyo-e Edo-Life
programme.desc: Mornings begin early for fishmongers and vegetable peddlers at Nihonbashi Bridge for a reason - they are not going to bow to the lord's procession in this bustling scene from everyday Edo life.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: A Japanese research team focusing on the fact that people briefly wake up multiple times during sleep helped develop a device to prevent insomnia - this episode shares the latest insights into sleep.

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers
programme.desc: Once a deadly combination, the bow and arrow have now developed into the martial art of kyudo - we explore the way of the bow as a means to achieving peace of mind.

programme.title: Kumano
programme.desc: Nature's Dynamism: The Kii Mountains are home to dynamic landscapes formed by a volcanic eruption 14 million years ago - we show the area's rock formations and rich ecosystem in time-lapse footage.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Higashinada Danjiri involves a parade of decorated floats pulled by teams of veterans and ridden by young performers that lean out over the crowd - 32 districts take part with their own float.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony
programme.desc: Discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden in Uda - here the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule as a sanctuary of local culture and history.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Cleaning. More than a chore, it's a way to calm the mind - spaces, products, and system designs to encourage cleaning. Explore a unique Japanese aesthetic and the potential of cleaning.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Cinematic Journey
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan - in this episode, Kyle Card hikes the newly-designated long trail around majestic Mount Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: Ramen Japan 5min.
programme.desc: Ramen packed with seafood goodness has been loved in bitterly cold northern Japan for over 100 years - try a bowl for yourself!

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: Taiwan's society is ageing at a rapid pace, but many choose to care for the elderly at home rather than send them to assisted living - aiding them are caregivers from among 230,000 foreign workers.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition
programme.desc: A Recipe for Succession: From finding business successors to preserving prized recipes, this episode focuses on ensuring the survival of companies and products that are at risk of disappearing.

programme.title: One in Every Japanese
programme.desc: 1 in 50 families have lost a child during pregnancy or soon after birth - a couple who lost their second son when two hours old talk about their grief and sorrow, a topic often not discussed in Japan.

programme.title: Living and Laughing with Illness
programme.desc: A Japanese organisation where people with mental illness discuss and consider how best to live rather than relying on doctors is spotlighted - we look closely at how they come to accept themselves.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: A Ghanaian entrepreneur and resident of Japan launched an online radio station as a way of giving back to the community - the project is inspiring some young Africans to pursue their own dreams.

programme.title: Japan's Top Inventions
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter - this time, automated ginjo koji makers.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Review
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan presents a sumo review looking back on the year 2025, a year in which many records were broken - we also look ahead to the Grand Sumo of 2026.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Reborn as AI: My Son's Story
programme.desc: After an American high school student loses his life in a mass shooting, his parents use AI to create an avatar of him to speak out against gun violence and to help them recover from the trauma.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Barakan Discovers Hagi
programme.desc: Yoshida Shoin was an educator whose students played key roles in Japan's modernisation - he died at 29, but his ideals still live on 160 years later. Peter Barakan visits Shoin's hometown of Hagi.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan
programme.desc: We cycle the Noto Peninsula hit by a major earthquake in 2024 - visit a temporary morning market where people who lost their shops sell goods and a salt-maker keeping traditional methods alive.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Cleaning. More than a chore, it's a way to calm the mind - spaces, products, and system designs to encourage cleaning. Explore a unique Japanese aesthetic and the potential of cleaning.

programme.title: Let's Enjoy Maths
programme.desc: Numbler erases part of a cake delivery memo resulting in the delivery of four cakes instead of one - Barky solves the mystery by showing the difference between ordinal numbers and cardinal numbers.

programme.title: Take Tech
programme.desc: A programme for upper primary to lower secondary school children about exploring everyday technologies all around them - each episode takes a piece of familiar tech and finds out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: History Uncovered
programme.desc: Starting with Ieyasu, the Tokugawa shoguns made clever use of falconry beyond mere hunting - uncover their deep connection with these majestic birds.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture - this episode looks at words related to plays and acting. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: At the Niihama Taiko Matsuri, teams of around 150 people carry taikodai (three-tonne parade floats housing a huge taiko drum) and compete to give the most powerful synchronised performance.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: 80 Years and Beyond
programme.desc: Japan inflicted deep wounds in World War II but suffered two atomic bombs; the people in this programme, from high schoolers to historians, use this dark chapter in history to build a brighter future.

programme.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Japan's snow is a big draw for tourists, but snow and ice can also pose dangers to drivers - we look at some Japanese technology being developed to prevent whiteouts and accidents on slippery roads.

programme.title: An Evolving Font
programme.desc: Contemporary artist Miyanaga Aiko visits Kyoto - the Mincho font, which was drawn by hand in around 1990, evokes 350-year-old hand-carved woodblocks made to print Buddhist sutras.

programme.title: Shadow Love - EP 10

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2112
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Queen of News Season 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin (Charmaine Sheh), who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with the Gu Zhaohua (Bosco Wong) and Zhang Jiayan (Selena Lee).

programme.title: Ms Incognito - EP 1
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] A bodyguard hides in a village as a kindergarten teacher to avoid her boss' enemies – but faces a new challenge in a skeptical strawberry farmer!

programme.title: Good Job - EP 6
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Love's Ambition - EP 2
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] TV host Xu Yan (Zhao Lusi) and urban elite Shen Haoming (William Chan) appear to have a perfect marriage, but it is riddled with secrets. Eventually, they shed their facades, grow closer again, and rediscover themselves.

programme.title: Shadow Love - EP 6
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The story follows Li Shuang (played by Song Yi), the adopted daughter of a great general guarding the borders of the Great Jin, and Jin An (played by Cheng Lei), the heir of Western Rong. The two join forces to root out a traitor, resolve a national crisis, and gradually fall in love.

programme.title: Good Job - EP 8
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 30
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 19
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 15
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 16
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 38
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 39

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 18
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 11
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 31
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 32
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners.
